content:
I found an old label "syntaxext": https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels/A-syntaxext
AFAICT it seems to be an old name for built-in proc-macros? Is it ok if I change all the usages to A-proc-macros and then delete the label?
or I can rename it to A-builtin-macros if you think it has value; but I don't think "syntaxet" is very descriptive
I think relabeling all the issues (including old issues) with A-proc-macros seems fine.
